page.title: 03BUTLINS HOLIDAY CENTRE
page.content: Built in 1962 by Sir Billy Butlin the centre is one of six in the U.K. It caters for 200,000 holiday makers a year with a full time workforce of 110 and a seasonal part-time workforce of 10,000. Originally holidaymakers would have full board and continuous entertainment provided.This type of holiday is still available, but an increasing number prefer a self_catering style.A caravan park is to be developed soon to offer yet another type of holiday. Facilities available within the centre are the open_air fun pool, fairground, theatre, boating lake, monorail, games rooms, live shows and bands.
